name: OR_LNLG_PREOP_APPT
description: This table contains the Preop Appointments information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: PREOP_APPT_UID
columns.description: The unique ID of the pre-op appointment.

columns.name: PREOP_APPT_VT_ID
columns.description: The visit ID of the pre-op appointment.

columns.name: PREOP_APPT_PROC_ID
columns.description: The procedure ID of the pre-op appointment.

columns.name: PREOP_APPT_PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: PREOP_APPT_PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider ID of the pre-op appointment.

columns.name: PREOP_APPT_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The department ID of the pre-op appointment.
